about_the_game:
Allows Kain Highwind and Vaan to equip the following items.

* Kain Highwind
- The Wanderer I (Appearance)
- The Wanderer II (Appearance)
- The Wanderer III (Appearance)
- Holy Lance (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* Vaan
- Sky Pirate Garb I (Appearance)
- Sky Pirate Garb II (Appearance)
- Sky Pirate Garb III (Appearance)
- Deathbringer (Weapon)
- Additional Chat Messages

* You must first purchase the game DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT or download DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition before you can use this content.

* If you are playing DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT Free Edition, you must first purchase the Kain Highwind Starter Pack and Vaan Starter Pack before you can use this content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2550 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 460 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1280x720 Low settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX 470 or NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1920x1080 High settings
